description: Application for a non-material Amendment to planning permission ref. P0798.24 dated 16/10/2024 to allow for alterations to the approved plans for Entrance 5
decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
* Provision of semi opaque vinyl to elevations/windows in side return per drawing no. 7915_RED_203 (and corresponding visuals provided 19-03-2025 by email)
*Application of paint to elevations per visuals provided 19-03-2025 by email
*Vinyl wrap existing gutter box per drawing no. 7915_RED_203 (and corresponding visuals provided 19-03-2025 by email)
The permission hereby granted does not supercede the previously imposed conditions and particulars approved under ref: P0798.24 and relate solely to Entrance 5 as shown on plans submitted.
